import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import * as chartData from '../../../../shared/data/dashboard/default' @Component({ selector: 'app-followers-growth', templateUrl: './followers-growth.component.html', styleUrls: ['./followers-growth.component.scss'] }) export class FollowersGrowthComponent { public followersGrowth = chartData.followersGrowth; public show: boolean = false toggle() { this.show = !this.show } }
